label: applicableCountry
comment: A country applicable to this product batch characteristic.
A country applicable to this product characteristic.
A country where this referenced standard is applicable.

rangeIncludes.comment: The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties, such as population, political organization, etc., used or referenced for trade purposes.

domainIncludes.comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of a group of products considered or dealt with together.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.
A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
